Name: SpacePig
About the game: Journey to the moon as the whimsical SpacePig in this fun and entertaining cartoon-style game. You’ll have a blast collecting coins and diamonds around the moon. Catch as many as you can, but beware of falling meteorites and spikes. Find out how you’re playing against other SpacePigs around the universe by posting your score in baKno’s Top Players list.
